gg.Book_Title_English: Life of Abunä Käräzun; Life of Abunä Täklä Näbiyat
gg.Book_Title_Original: On the front cover: ገድለ  ኣቡነ  ከረዙን   ኣቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ነቢያት፡ (Gädlä ᾽Abunä Käräzun  ᾽Abunä Täklä Näbiyat); f. IIv:  ዘአቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ነብያት፡ / አቡነ፡ ከረዙን፡ (Zä-᾽Äbunä Täklä Näbəyat / ᾽Äbunä Käräzun); written with a pencil
gg.Former_Identifiers: HMML_001; A45GE - on a small paper strip glued to the back side of the front cover; 43 - f. Ir, upper part; 268 - f. Ir, lower part, written in large numbers; C3–IV–137 (number provided by the Ethiopian Tourist Office) - on a small paper strip glued on f. 1ra, lower margin
gg.AffiliationDepartment1: University of Toronto Scarborough, Department of Historical and Cultural Studies, Canada
gg.AffiliationDepartment2: Uppsala University, Department of Linguistics and Philology, Sweden
gg.Abstract: Text 1: ff. 1r-56va: Life of Abba Täklä Näbiyat, (f. 1vb, 1-2: … ገድሉ፡ ለዝንቱ፡ አቡነ፡ ተክለ፡ ነቢያት፡ መምህር፡ ዘደብረ፡ ገርዜን። …); Text 2: ff. 59r-135ra: Life of Abba Abäkäräzun, (f. 59ra15-rb1… ዜና፡ ገድሉ፡ ለብፁዕ፡ ወለቅዱስ፡ አቡነ፡ አበከረዙን፡)
gg.Decoration_Description: ff. IIIv and IVv: unfinished ornamental drawings
gg.HoldingsDigital: 1. University of Toronto Scarborough Library   2. Hill Museum and Monastic Library, Collegeville, Minnesota, USA
gg.Physical_Description_Notes: Number of folios: 2 (I-II), 135, 2 (III-IV); (European pagination); Number of quires: 19; Number of columns of the text: 2; Number of lines in columns: Text 1: 14-15; Text 2: 19-20
gg.Bibliographic_Information: Text 2: Vitae sanctorum indigenarum, ed. (and transl. into latin) Karolus Conti Rossini], (CSCO [56] (and [57]), Scriptores Aethiopici 2:24 [= 25 (and 265)], Textus), Romae and Parisiis: and Lipsiae, 1910

gg.Book_Title_English: Life of Estifanos (the founder of the Stephanite monastuic “order”)
gg.Book_Title_Original: Front cover: ገድለ  እስጢፋኖስ፡ (Gädlä  ᾽Ǝsṭifanos); f. 2ra,1-10: በስመ፡ … ገድል፡ አስምዕ፡ ዘብፁዕ፡ ወቅዱስ፡ ዓምደ፡ ሄይማኖት፡ ማኅቶተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ አብ፡ እስጢፍኖስ፡ … (In the name of…, Life and martyrdom of the blessed and holy, the pillar of the faith, the lamp of the Christians, Father ᾽Ǝsṭifanos …)
gg.Former_Identifiers: HMML_002; 2 - f. Ir; 178 - f. 1r, written in large letters; C3–IV–149 (number provided by the Ethiopian Tourist Office) - on a small paper strip glued on f. 2rb, lower margin
gg.AffiliationDepartment1: University of Toronto Scarborough, Department of Historical and Cultural Studies, Canada
gg.AffiliationDepartment2: Uppsala University, Department of Linguistics and Philology, Sweden
gg.Decoration_Description: Miniatures: 1. f. 1r: Mary with the Child flanked by archangels; 2. f. 1v: Abba ᾽Ǝsṭifanos; Heading decoration (haräg), f. 2r
gg.Notes: ff. 18r-28v, 34r-44v, 88v-91r: text damaged; ff. 90v-91v: note (charter) of the gift of the area of  ʽAnza for (the Monastery of) Gundä Gunde for the commemoration of our Father ᾽Ǝsṭifanos
gg.HoldingsDigital: 1. University of Toronto Scarborough Library   2. Hill Museum and Monastic Library, Collegeville, Minnesota, USA
gg.Physical_Description_Notes: Number of folios: 3 (I-III) + 91 + 5 (IV-VIII); Number of quires: 16; Number of columns of the text: 2; Number of lines in columns: 14-19
gg.Bibliographic_Information: The Gəʽəz Acts of Abba Ǝsṭifanos of Gwəndagwənde, ed. and transl. Getatchew Haile, (CSCO vol. 619-620, Scriptores Aethiopici, tomus 110-111), Lovanii: Peeters, 2006
